fullbio.fullbio:
As a Full-stack developer with experience in both software development and system administration, I have worked extensively with various tools and technologies related to automating software deployments and configuring CI/CD pipelines. Skilled in monitoring systems and improving software quality, some of my favorite tools include [Debian](https://www.debian.org/CD/http-ftp/ "Download Debian"), [Docker](https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/debian/ "Install Docker on Debian"), [Nginx](https://nginxproxymanager.com/ "NginX Proxy Manager"), [Python](https://www.python.org/downloads/ "Download Python"), [Flask](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/2.1.x/ "Flask Micro Framework Documentation"), [CircleCI](https://circleci.com/ "CircleCI"), [Linode](https://www.linode.com/ "Linode | AWS alternative") and [AWS](https://aws.amazon.com/ "Amazon Web Services"). I am passionate about learning new technologies and sharing my knowledge with others; using DevOps best practices to improve everyone's lives.

In my previous roles, I've provided support to multiple development teams and have a good understanding of the software development process.
